Model Structure

Figure 5 illustrates how the transport sector is represented in the model, using key elements like fleet composition, freight and passenger demands and energy consumptions. The transport portion of the model is mainly based on the Strategic Framework for Electric Mobility from the Inter-American Development Bank to factors like technology efficiency, cost and fleet composition.

Technologies

Table 3. Transport Technologies

Tech

Description

TRAUT

Automobiles

TRSUV

Pick Up and Jeep

TRMOT

Motorcycle

TRTAX

Taxi

TRMBS

Minibus

TRBPU

Bus Public

TRTYK

Heavy Truck

TRLYF

Light Truck

TRMAR

Maritime

TRMAMFRE

Maritime Freight

TRAV

Aviation
